mapper.select: SELECT CLASSIFICATION_SCHEME_UUID as classificationSchemeUuid, STATUS_UUID as statusUuid, CLASSIFICATION_CODE as classificationCode, CLASSIFICATION_NAME as classificationName, CLASSIFICATION_TYPE_UUID as classificationTypeUuid, ORDER_NO as orderNo, DESCRIPTION as descrtiption, NOTES as notes, USE_YN as useYn, as insertUuid, INSERT_DATE as insertDate, as updateUuid, UPDATE_DATE as updateDate FROM CL_CLASSIFICATION_SCHEME
